script.caption: A sheep with a gold chain around its neck and a baseball cap on its head standing in a grocery store.

dialogue.text: In the mist-enshrouded hills of an ancient land, there lies a mystery as old as time itself. Behold the enigmatic sheep, creatures shrouded in the lore and legend of yesteryears.

script.caption: A sheep with a wizard hat casting magic spells and rituals

dialogue.text: For centuries, scholars and mystics have pondered over their serene demeanors and unassuming presence.
What arcane knowledge do they guard beneath their fluffy exteriors?

script.caption: A man looking at sheep eating grass around a field.

dialogue.text: Join us, as we unravel the ancient mystery of the sheep.
